name: Bottle Stopping device, complete
description:
Pneumatic controlled
Consists of:
- 2-armed steel gate with 2 plastic rollers,
- pneumatic cylinder;
- pneumatic positioning sensor;
- foot press key for opening the gate;
with 5/2-way pneumatic valve design
valve and pedal of aluminum,
body of plastics, incl. safety cover,
incl. all connections and pneumatic hoses.
